name: Psychedelicelipses
tagline: using p5.js and procressing, I made a 640x480 canvas where on mouse over a black elipse fills the screen and on mouse down, random colored elipses follow the mouse.
body:
###**Fun Times with Canvas!**
#### the more I play around with these different libraries for canvas and javasdcript, the more excited i get at   ![Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/gSiigd4.gif?1) 
![Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/gSiigd4.gif?1)
the future of HTML5 and front end development. 
find the code and my keyboard with sound that I made using the same library at [erikasf](http://erikasf.com)
See a video of the actual outcome by checking out the github page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
